availableMods.name: SRModsList
availableMods.author: Mondanzo
availableMods.description: Add a new button to the main menu to open a mod list

availableMods.name: Trashbin
availableMods.author: Goinn
availableMods.description: Adds a button to delete songs for Synth Riders [PCVR]. Deleted songs will be added to NoodleManagerX's blacklist

availableMods.name: MultiplayerSongGrabber
availableMods.author: Goinn
availableMods.description: Download missing custom songs with the click of a button inside a multiplayer lobby! For Synth Riders [PCVR]

availableMods.name: CustomSounds
availableMods.author: Goinn
availableMods.description: Allows you to customize most sounds from Synth Riders [PCVR]

availableMods.name: SRModCore
availableMods.author: bookdude13
availableMods.description: Shared library used by various SynthRiders mods

availableMods.name: SRVoting
availableMods.author: bookdude13
availableMods.description: In-game up/down voting UI for custom songs

availableMods.name: PerformanceMeter
availableMods.author: bookdude13
availableMods.description: View additional playthrough statistics/info in-game after each song
